name: localeyz-directus-extension
description: A Directus extension tailored for Localeyz, enabling seamless integration and management of multilingual content.

scripts.start: pnpm i && pnpm run build && directus start
scripts.stag: pnpm i && pnpm run build && pm2 restart localeyz-v2
scripts.build: cd ./custom/bundles/localeyz/ && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.directus:schema:snapshot: npx directus schema snapshot --yes schema/schema.yaml && mkdir -p schema/previous && cp schema/schema.yaml schema/previous/$(date +'%Y%m%d%H%M%S')-schema.yaml
